text: “Ofa gamir gumazibar dapanim, uan ingangarimɨn ziar ekiam ini. Me borem an dapanim gingezir dughiamɨn, me ofa gamir gumazibar korotiamra, a daghuasa anemɨsefe. Eghtɨ an adarazir tav aremeghtɨ, a uan dapanir arɨzim ateghtɨ a pura ikian markɨ, a deraghvɨram a batogh. Egh a uan korotiam abɨghan markɨ.
